name: Create Vertical Response contacts from Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new person added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a contact in Vertical Response. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rl53Q7lL2aFK8xdrNJOEav-MM6u1vTaCFrqa8qcN8Uc/edit?usp=sharing).
